name: BRAINFART (Charlie)
description:
Brainfart is an interactive experiment, created in 2018 as a study on loneliness.

I have been working from home for over two years.  As a result, I dearly miss my drive and the office morning routine.

My commute is now the walk from the kitchen, and the only noise I hear is the soft whir of my PC beginning to wake. 

No more do I win imaginary arguments while I sit in traffic on the freeway. No more do I participate in morning jokes with my coworkers as we imbibe our morning caffeine.

As the first few months of my new work reality settled in, I noticed that I create my own commute of sorts:  A meditative process of slowly checking into my space.  I commute to a state of mind, rather than an office with friends—to find freedom in the stillness.
